Container.Name: TV Manager
Container.Overview: Automated TV show manager and Sonarr queue cleaner. This tool provides: - A small web UI to manage and monitor processed TV show folders - Automatic PNG (Plex-style artwork) injection into episode directories - Periodic cleanup of Deluge torrents with invalid files or stuck states - Automatic Sonarr queue cleanup for failed/manual items

Variable.Name: SONARR_MIN_AGE
Variable.Description: Minimum age (minutes) for failed/manual items before deletion

Variable.Name: BASE_DIR
Variable.Description: Base directory where TV shows are stored

Variable.Name: PROCESSED_DIR_FILE
Variable.Description: Path to JSON file storing processed directories

Variable.Name: PNG_FILE
Variable.Description: Path to the PNG image to inject into episode directories

Config.Name: Data Folder
Config.Description: Stores app data and processed directories list
